CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For the photovoltaic devices fabricated using PFD2TBT - based polymers , the shortcircuit currents of the devices also increased as the perylene content in the copolymers increased ; however , the PCEs of the devices using PFD2TBT - based polymers were lower than those of PFDTBT - based polymers because of lower open - circuit voltages and short - circuit currents.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT |
| PFDTBT |

Explanation:

* PFD2TBT: This is a material name as it is mentioned as a type of polymer used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
* PFDTBT: This is also a material name as it is mentioned as a type of polymer that is being compared with PFD2TBT-based polymers in terms of their photovoltaic device performance.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PFD2TBT |
| PFDTBT |

Explanation:

* PFD2TBT: This is the only clear material name mentioned in the paragraph as it is used to describe a type of polymer used in the fabrication of photovoltaic devices.
* PFDTBT: This is also a clear material name mentioned in the paragraph as it is used to describe a type of polymer that is being compared with PFD2TBT-based polymers in terms of their photovoltaic device performance.
